thread.title: Why Lilly’s Pipeline Worries Aren’t Over
thread.title_full: Why Lilly’s Pipeline Worries Aren’t Over - WSJ

author: Charley Grant
title: Why Lilly’s Pipeline Worries Aren’t Over
text:
The failure of a major drug candidate has Eli Lilly’s pipeline looking a little less bountiful. That raises the stakes for its remaining programs.
The company’s investors were dealt a body blow on Monday morning when the company announced the termination of a Phase 3 trial for its experimental heart-disease treatment, evacetrapib. The study was discontinued for a lack of efficacy.
In some ways, the news shouldn’t have come as... To Read the Full Story, Subscribe or Sign In
